attributes.background: Keep unity park as it is the most favourite park in the area and ever comes to have a good time and police want to shut it

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

If the police are involved, you could also raise this with your local elected Police and Crime Commissioner:

http://www.staffordshire-pcc.gov.uk/
